Summary: A "constellation" of lights in the distance that changed shape and color.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Holland
There were no other sightings in Holland on or around April 1st 0001
divs: Sighting DetailsMy family and I (4), were on 196 between Hudsonville and Zeeland, at about 10:00pm, when my daughter(15), pointed out to me to look at a "constellation" in the west, at abour 30 degrees up from the horizon, that was changing shape. After watching for a few min.,we also saw color changes in the lights. At that point, my husband pulled off to the highway shoulder, so he could also get a good look. We all watched the bizzare lights for a moment, and then decided to get off the highway for a better (safer) look. Watched the strange lights for about 15min, and decided to drive to the home on lake that we were staying. Through the town of Holland we saw nothing to the west (city lights), but once on the lake, saw the same lights in the same sky area. I seemed to us that the lights stayed in the same spot over Lake Michigan, just randomly changing shape and color. ALL 4 of us saw this strange event. My husband watched the event until about 12:00 am. Not sure what we witnessed, but it was a first for all of us.
